body_html:
let me clarify what I understood. You have some categorical features and associated weights. Instead of an one-hot/indicator, you need corresponding weight replaces 'ones'.
Could you please check 'weighted_sparse_column'?

body:
let me clarify what I understood. You have some categorical features and associated weights. Instead of an one-hot/indicator, you need corresponding weight replaces 'ones'.
